description:
### 11.49 cover_rect

Cover a rectangular object

It accepts the following options:

**cover**

    Filepath of the optional cover image, needs to be in yuv420. 

**mode**

    Set covering mode. It accepts the following values: ‘cover’ cover it by the supplied image ‘blur’ cover it by interpolating the surrounding pixels Default value is blur.
name: cover_rect

options.description: Filepath of the optional cover image, needs to be in yuv420.
options.name: cover

options.description:
Set covering mode.

It accepts the following values:

‘cover’

cover it by the supplied image

‘blur’

cover it by interpolating the surrounding pixels

Default value is blur.
options.name: mode
